entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
